title: Emergency Treatment for Plant Poisoning
brief: Emergency first aid for suspected plant ingestion poisoning.
steps: Step 1: Remove any remaining plant material from victim's mouth immediately.
Step 2: If victim is conscious, induce vomiting by tickling back of throat.
Step 3: Alternatively, give warm salt water to conscious victim to induce vomiting.
Step 4: Dilute the poison by giving large quantities of water or milk to conscious victim.
Step 5: Keep victim awake and monitor breathing and heart rate.
Step 6: Maintain detailed log of all symptoms and timeline.
warnings: Only induce vomiting if victim is fully conscious.
Do not give liquids to unconscious victims - they may aspirate.
Symptoms can include nausea, vomiting, diarrhea, unconsciousness, coma, and death.
Some plant poisons can kill very quickly - seek immediate help if possible.
